content: materials and tools hook 1 75 mm yarn yarnart iris 20 g / 138 m green no 927 white no 910 and black no 935 you will need 1 piece of each yarn needle sewing needle with a large eye scissors stuffing material you can use any materials that are convenient for you but ensure that all sizes and tools match the pattern requirements symbols a m r amigurumi magic_ring amigurumi circle chain chain single_crochet single_crochet increase increase decrease decrease sl slip_stitch double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet fl front loops only bl back loops only turn turn your work so you can work back for the next row
